item.title: Update R with installr package
item.description: Open RGui (I do it from the apps search on Windows) Load installr (or install it, if you don’t have it installed) # load or install installr package if(!require(installr)) { install.packages("installr"); require(installr)} # with that you launch the update of R installation. # It will look for the most updated version and if does not match your # it will give you the option to update your installation. updateR()
